alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:35AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Noonday Creek at Shallowford Road near Woodstock affecting Cobb and Cherokee Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Noonday Creek at Shallowford Road near Woodstock. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and natural flood plain near the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Shallowford Road. Portions of Noonday Creek Park and residential backyards on Bridge Drive will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:31 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
